unittitle_ssm: Walter Rosenblum Unitarian Service Committee Papers
abstract_ssm: The collection includes personal papers, clippings, and ephemera documenting in a general way Walter Rosenblum's work for the Unitarian Service Committee in Toulouse and Saint-Jean de Luz, France (1946).
corpname_ssm: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
